page.title: 11LEISURE
page.content:
also people grow potatoes, tomatoes, beetroot and carrots and then these are sold. This is the second most popular way of spending their leisure time. Twenty people in our survey spend their time in the garden. The ages start from 40 years old to 60 years old.
BEACHES.
The beach is a very popular place in the summer months (May to August).The people who go to the beaches get a very good tan. The temperatures range from 70 degrees C - 83 degrees C. The most popular beach for the people who live in this area is called 'Petit Bot' Bay. The ages are from 18-45 years old. Eighteen people in our area go to the beach in the summer.
